Rationale for Skill

  • API's are a critical part of Backend of any application.
  • The goal of API programming is to make the user's interaction as robust as possible, in terms of accomplishing user goals, such that the operation succeeds except for user-side error, for example: input data validation

Roles for Skill

  • Develop Robust API
  • Intuitive API
  • Write proper documentation to make the use of API easy, less cumbersome and clear.

Work Related to Skill (Related Activities and Artifacts)


Real-World Example/Scenario of Skill (Text, Graphic, Audio, Video)

  1. Google provides API's for Developers Google's API Explorer
  2. Twitter API's to send, retrieve tweets, direct messages, media, geo-location, tweet statistics Twitter API Docs
  3. Facebook provides API's to manage content by programmingFacebook Developers Guide
